description: Chance of holding n-th best poker hand or better is approximately 1/a(n).
references: "The Complete Guide to Winning Poker", Albert Morehead, chapter 8.
example: The chance of holding a pair of queens or a better hand is approximately 1/6. The chance of holding 2 pairs or a better hand is approximately 1/13.
author: _Jud McCranie_, Oct 21 2000
